body: Man i love this multiseries, I love the story of it and some major character developments, that kid showed a change in character, they grow up so fast, I love how all throughout this series, this kid wants to claim MILT for himself, I guess he's being selfish but I understand him, if I were him I wouldn't let go of an opportunity like that and in one of the series in this multiseries, he fucked his mother or I should say 3 series of doujins like damn, this character is so likable
